articles.description: Who comes out of Saturday night's showdown in Arlington with a win?
articles.content:
I don’t like to be that guy. You know who I’m talking about. The guy who says “college football is better when team ‘X’ is good.”
Sorry, but I love this silly sport whether Kansas is trucking teams … [+11376 chars]

articles.title: The Plays That Changed the Game - WVU vs Virginia Tech - 247Sports
articles.description: The plays that changed the game in WVU-Virginia Tech.
articles.content: West Virginia is in the win column for the second week in a row, going down to Blacksburg and defeating rival Virginia Tech, 33-10. While the score may seem lopsided, the competition was actually qui… [+757 chars]
